00031 #ifndef ASSOCIATION_REQUEST_H
00032 #define ASSOCIATION_REQUEST_H
00033 
00041 typedef struct
00042 {
00043     u8  nodeType;           
00044     u64 nodeLongAddress;    
00045     u16 parentShortAddress; 
00046     u16 lastRoutedAddress;  
00047     u8  wakeup:1;             
00048     u8 sleeping:1;            
00049 } __attribute__((packed)) associatedNodes_t;
00050 
00051 // Define the maximum number of nodes a coordinator can associate
00052 #define MAXNODES 100
00053
